review: Love my chromecast.  Allows me to to get Netflix, Hulu, or Plex at night when I'm going to sleep.  And I can play my games, read, or watch videos while managing whats on my TV at the same time.  Cheap, simple, easy to install.  If you have any Android device this is a no brainer!
author: Anonymous

review: Prompt delivery, nice packaging and clear instructions made the product instantly pleasing.I watch a lot of Netflix and some YouTube through my iPhone after installing the extensions for both apps. They work wonderfully!Also, I cast streaming video from my MacBook Pro by installing the Cast extension on my Chrome browser and it works beautifully. I went from streaming news and variety shows on my iPhone 5S while eating dinner to watching it on my big screen TV. So the "beta" tab casting works a lot better than most described in the countless user reviews I had read prior to purchasing. Only about 5% of the time did I experience connection issues... and then again, that may be a problem with my connection, not the device.This little gem definitely made my life a little bit more convenient. Highly recommended!
